overview: Jericajazz is a musical documentary film that shows us the history of the jazz scene in Guadalajara’s metropolitan area during the decades of the 70s and 90s, through the testimonies and musical speeches from some of its most famous performers. In a certain way, it is a well-deserved learned recognition to the career of these music masters that gave fame to this city as a cradle of great musicians, as well as an urgent record of our musical history that, beyond traditional, it enunciates as a group of universal sounding elements.
tagline: Jericajazz is a musical documentary film that shows us the history of the jazz scene in Guadalajara’s metropolitan area during the decades of the 70s and 90s.
title: JERICAJAZZ. Jazz From WetLand
